content:
A spokesman for the Air Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Major Elijah Yevlash told what Russian aircraft of Ukraine's defense forces recorded this night near the border.

Ilya Yevlash provided his comments during thelive ethertelethon "United News" on March 31, 2024.

"We recorded Russian multi-purpose Su-34 and Su-35 along the border with Ukraine ...

At the same time, he emphasized that the forces of Ukraine's defense and, in particular, the Air Force are constantly ready to destroy them.

As reported by the Armyinform, fordataOn the night of March 31, 2024, the Russian occupiers attacked with 14 Kh-101/Kh-555 cruise missiles, 11 Shahed attack UAVs, an Iskander-M ballistic missile and a Kh-59 guided air missile.

At the same time, Ukraine's air defense has shot down 9 winged missiles X-101/X-555 and 9 shock UAVs Shahd-136/131 Russian invaders.
title: The Air Force spoke about Russian planes near the border of Ukraine
description: Ilya Yevlash provided his comments during the live broadcast of the telethon "United News" on 31...
author: Army Inform
